Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just a purchase but an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its exceptional features and the care put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I propose a special introductory price of $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a fantastic deal. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested in bringing this piece into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
